modules.description: Provides functions for working with a unified Either type across OCaml versions, including constructors for left and right values, and a bind operation for chaining computations. Operates on the Either type, which represents values with two possible outcomes. Enables seamless integration of Either in projects requiring compatibility with OCaml 4.12 and earlier.

Constructs and inspects values representing one of two possible outcomes, either a left or right value. Operates on the polymorphic variant type ('a, 'b) t, allowing transformations and checks for each branch. Enables error handling by mapping over left values, extracting values for processing, and comparing or checking equality between instances.
